field.name: CruiseSpeed
field.description: Cruise speed in level flight-- leave some safety margin

field.name: BestClimbRateSpeed
field.description: Airspeed at which airframe climbs at the best rate (Vy)

field.name: StallSpeedClean
field.description: Stall speed of the airframe when aerodynamically clean-- leave safety margin.

field.name: StallSpeedDirty
field.description: Stall speed of the airframe, with flaps and landing gear deployed. Leave some safety margin.

field.name: VerticalVelMax
field.description: Maximum allowed climb or sink rate in guided flight
